TopicTitle: How to maintain a stable orbit??

Articles.Content:
So after deciding to try science mode for the first time, (somewhat cheatless) I've been launching probes into orbits with just a few 1000 meters in difference between apoapsis and periapsis.

Whenever i time warp, my periapsis shoots downwards and next thing i know i'm entering the atmosphere!

I'm not sure how to achieve a stable orbit in terms of what thing to drag on maneuver nodes, and its starting to annoy me!!

Any help would be amazing, as most tutorials I've watched dont address these finer adjustments.

Thanks! 

(Ps, sorry if my formatting is off this is my first post here)
